_header: Up I arose in verbo tempore
_description: A betrayed maiden’s lament — four macaronic quatrains

BodAsh176.First Lines:
Vp I arose in verno tempore& found a mayd sub quadam
                        arbore…
BodAsh176.Last Lines:
…Yf I yt sley quo loco fugiamI shall lose god &
                        vitam eternam
